snippet: The Knight Capital Group is in talks to sell its futures brokerage unit with a number of potential buyers, including the trading firm R.J. O'Brien, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Friday.
abstract: The Knight Capital Group is in talks to sell its futures brokerage unit with a number of potential buyers, including the trading firm R.J. O'Brien, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Friday.

byline.original: By AZAM AHMED, BEN PROTESS and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Knight Said to Hold Talks to Sell Futures Brokerage Unit
